segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, with cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, towel in hand over the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet runs full, basin full to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflow cascades frontward, hitting doors and tile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle widens slowly across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balances on stool, arm extended to jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands close, palm up in expectation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies peek from the open jar inside cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window's garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly to the right, untouched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, it's a snapshot of everyday life teetering.
segments.speaker: PAR
